Convertor is written in object pascal, and is using the 
[http://www.freepascal.org | free pascal] compiler and the
[http://lazarus.freepascal.org | Lazarus] widgets and library. So first go
ahead and install Lazarus, it will install fpc with it.

Now download the latest source code from the [/timeline | timeline] page. click
on the artifact ID, and then download the source code as zip or tarball.

Uncompress, open 'convertor.lpi' with lazarus, and compile. finito..
